QuestData.Title: The Butchers of Bastion
QuestData.Description:
Did these fiends show my kin mercy when they attacked Bastion? When they tore my brothers and sisters limb from limb and used them to create more of these... these things?!
No! The butchers of Bastion made clear their hearts that day!
They deserve only the eternal darkness that awaits them. Ensure they see it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa House of Constructs forces in the Separation Chamber.
